Initial Post

12 Aug 2014

This is a test of a few different systems that I've wanted to play with lately: namely, github pages and Jekyll, which I guess I'm testing via Poole. In particular, I'm playing with the Poole's Hyde theme.

I plan to use this space to publish little odds and ends that I need a place for. If you like what you see here in the future, feel free to tell me so.

Cheers!
